item.description:
Join us as we gradually work our way through the restaurants of the North End in 2011! We will be heading to the well known Limoncello Restaurant . After dinner, we will probably head nearby for dessert or drinks. Don't miss out on a fun evening of good company and delicious Italian food. Each member pays for their own food/drink.

If you have trouble finding us, please call Catherine at 774 232 0000.

RSVP note: Meet Up has removed the 'maybe' option from the RSVP list. Please only sign up if you can definitely attend. If your plans change, be sure to change your RSVP as soon as possible.
item.why: Delicious Italian food & drinks in the North End and good company- join us for a great night!
item.name: Join us for a North End Dinner & Drinks Series: Limoncello Restaurant
